channel.title: 🔥 Open Data hot twitter posts | by onData

item.description: A pet peeve of mine is when a company announces an open data program that requires you to apply for access, but then doesn't accept all applicants. That's a closed data program.

item.title: #en @ 1440980239434145795
item.description: Simple questions like where's open data? Why are you selling publicly-funded data? Communities and LGUs need to make robust plans, they shouldn't have to write letters in this day and age. Also, so we see our blind spots, where we need more R&D funding, spread the funding out.

item.title: #ja @ 1440961737822404614
item.description:
✍️世界の貧困 「世銀 コロナの影響で貧困が増加」
■20年コロナで世界の1億1900〜2400万人が貧困に陥ると予測。
■推定値は“9,700万人”と予測値より減少するも歴史上前例のない増加。
■21年高所得国の需要増加で貧困減少が予測されるが不確実性は高い。
出典) 世銀 https://t.co/0deBzRQdbk

item.title: #en @ 1440729402879328259

There are 2.1 million women in Alberta.
There are approximately 5797 Jasons in Alberta. (https://t.co/vw1qjQrwc8)
There are 4 Jasons currently in the @Alberta_UCP cabinet and there are 5 women. We need to fix this!
Can we PLEASE get one more Jason in there?
#parity #AbLeg

item.title: #en @ 1440655877879468034
item.description:
We are launching the data.europa academy next week! 🚀
Through trainings and courses you will learn what #OpenData is and how to work with it. Whether you are a data provider, policy-maker, or data enthusiast, this academy is for you.
Stay tuned for more details to come! 🎓 https://t.co/Pwzbkwv3Xu

item.description:

Aunque nos deja pegados a @DATAuy con ese nivel de productividad, vaya este saludo y agradecimiento. https://t.co/yWdnoLGBKB

item.description: 諏訪之瀬島で火山性地震が増加 情報更新 https://t.co/XQF7vVKvGC 9月21日214回を追加。2日連続で1日200回を超えたのは7月5日410回、6日276回以来、1日50回以上の連続日数は9月14日～21日の8日になりました。 気象庁 諏訪之瀬島 日別地震回数表 https://t.co/siUhAYCzfc

item.title: #en @ 1440613146788384768
item.description: Just had request for data from 2011, which confirms all the advice I've been given: - You will not remember old passwords - Old hard drives won't work any more - You will have many files called 'final' - Keep your scripts as well as data - Store open data for your future self!

item.title: #en @ 1440598344825409541
item.description:
@Sandeshgulhane The Scottish Government have an #Open Data strategy (2015) which is on their website. It states that data will be "open by default*
They ignore it. So last year we had to fight to get Covid data published and you have to push for ambulance waiting time data. We're being failed
